review: Had some trouble in my HDMI 3 port. Moved it to the HDMI 2, seems to work okay now.
author: Amazon Customer

review: This is the best thing since sliced bread. It beats the chrome cast hands down. Amazon prime is GREAT!! Programs show the Imdb review when you scroll thru them so you know what's good and what's not. It's the best. I'm buying 2 more of these!
author: Bill English

review: It is not that great, doesn't always work. Also slow sometimes, but still a good thing to have. Comparing it to the now only $69 Apple TV, O would reach that.
author: A. Gordon

review: Works great. So glad I switched from DirectTV.
author: mj77

review: I'm very happy with my fire stick, and once I learn more about it, I'm sure I will be even happier.
author: connie

review: Love the FireStick, nice interface easy to install great apps including sling TV.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Makes any Plain Jane HDTV the smartest TV in the house. Super easy to install. Huge amount of added Movie and TV content - especially if you have Amazon Prime.
author: Nicholas C. Belmonte
